title: Free field construction for the eight-vertex model: representation for form factors
abstract: The free field realization of the eight-vertex model is extended to form factors. It is achieved by constructing off-diagonal with respect to the ground state sectors matrix elements of the $\Lambda$ operator which establishes a relation between corner transfer matrices of the eight-vertex model and of the SOS model. As an example, the two-particle form factor of the $\sigma^z$ operator is evaluated explicitly.
